author: wtopstaff
title: Oilers-Flames Sum
text:
First Period_1, Edmonton, Nugent-Hopkins 2 (Gryba, Hall), 12:59. 
Second Period_2, Calgary, D.Jones 2 (Wideman, Ferland), 5:07. 3, Edmonton, McDavid 2 (Yakupov), 16:31. 
Third Period_4, Edmonton, Hall 2 (Klefbom, Hendricks), :25. 5, Edmonton, Yakupov 1 (Pouliot, McDavid), 2:59. 6, Calgary, D.Jones 3 (Wideman), 10:14 (pp). 7, Edmonton, McDavid 3 (Hall, Sekera), 16:20 (pp). 
Shots on Goal_Edmonton 5-14-9_28. Calgary 8-5-11_24.
